name: repo-improvement-scout
description: Scan D:/WindsurfProjects/localcode to propose app, master-agent, UX/UI, and workflow improvements.

steps.title: Repository context sweep
steps.description: Enumerate key packages and services under D:/WindsurfProjects/localcode (master-agent, agent-service, shared-rag, client). Summarize purpose, tech stack, and running ports. Note missing deps or setup friction.

steps.title: User experience quick audit
steps.description: Review client dashboard flows (tasks, delegation stream, workflow suggestions). Identify UX/UI pain points, confusing states, and missing affordances; propose concrete improvements with rationale.

steps.title: Master agent workflow gaps
steps.description: Inspect master-agent delegation lifecycle (delegate/cancel/review loops) and startup workflows. Suggest improvements for robustness, clarity, and observability (logging, retries, status surface).

steps.title: Performance and reliability scan
steps.description: Look for obvious performance or stability issues (unbounded streams, missing timeouts, error handling). Recommend targeted fixes.

steps.title: Actionable recommendations
steps.description: Produce a prioritized list of improvement suggestions (app features, master-agent loop, UX/UI, dev ergonomics). For each: short title, area, impact, effort, and suggested next step.
